item.title: IBM Plex Mono
item.description: Going to use IBM Plex Mono for daily work (Terminal, Sublime, VSCode, Chrome). Some notes for my personal setup cross-laptop (osx, kubuntu, windows) Download from Google Fonts Install via Font Book app Download powerline patch font - perplexed and install via Font Book app, too. Specify the font onto each application. Enjoy!
